channel.title: Tesla on FinanClub
channel.description: Recent content in Tesla on FinanClub

item.title: 1186 TSLA
item.description: score:1186 Chances: Electric vehicle maker Lucid cut prices of its Air luxury sedans, sparking a price war with Tesla’s Model S and Model S Plaid. Tesla’s plans to monetize AI could potentially boost its growth in the long term. Upcoming plans for an upgraded Model 3 and leaks about the Model 3 refresh called Project Highland could have positive implications for Tesla.

item.title: LAZR | Stock Analysis by ChatGPT
item.description: Chances: Luminar Technologies has announced the addition of two new key executives, indicating potential growth and expansion of the company’s leadership team. Millionaire-maker growth stocks have seen significant appreciation this year, and Luminar Technologies, as a leading global automotive technology company, may have the potential to benefit from the ongoing bull market.
